articles.title: 'I think at that point I just died inside... just those words... your child has cancer' - The Irish Times
articles.description: Norah Hayes and family are fundraising to take Alice to the Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center in America to undergo further treatment
articles.content: Norah Hayes knew something was wrong with her nine-year-old daughter Alice. Her bubbly, energetic, active, little girl just wasnt herself. I started having major concerns back in January, Norah expla… [+3131 chars]
